reviewtext: So, If CC Crane is listing this along with their awesome collection of MW & SW radios - wouldn't you get it too? I looked long and hard - Crane was ok, but I already had a Grundig PE 400 and wanted a radio for primarily AM reception (I like to DX from time to time) GE Superradio III does the trick, and I got it from Amazon for 39.00!! Target doesn't even carry it anymore, and Sears does for $70. What a ripoff!! Thanks to Amazon - they paid for the shipping (Got it before Christmas) and came in tight packaging with no problems whatsoever. This is the best radio in the business, I get KGO from SF like a local LA station at night - no static like my other units. Thanks. JG
summary: THIS IS THE RADIO TO BUY!! FYI - CC RADIO CATALOG HAS THIS FOR SALE TOO!!
